switchToSetup.text: The app is currently in '{{schedulerState}}' state. Please switch to 'Setup' to add a device.

switchToSetupOrOperating.text: The app is currently in '{{schedulerState}}' state. Please switch to 'Setup' or 'Operating' state to manage devices.

noPermission.text: You do not have the required permissions to see this page.

appNotAvailable.heading: The Adapter device app is currently not available (Error: {{status}}).
appNotAvailable.line2: This is most likely due to one of the following reasons:
appNotAvailable.appBeingInitialized: The app is currently initialized. This may take a while, please {{linkText}} the page

add-instance.title: Add Adapter device
add-instance.name.maxlength: The name is longer than 15 characters

del-instance.title: Delete Adapter device
del-instance.info1: The Adapter device '{{instanceName}}' will be deleted.
del-instance.info2: The field bus communication will be stopped and the configuration will be deleted.
del-instance.warning: Ensure that all appliances are in safe state before proceeding.
